Class P1_Wang_Jake_DrawSnow

extends java.lang.Object
    Function to draw snow with when IsSnowing is on

      • P1_Wang_Jake_DrawSnow

        public P1_Wang_Jake_DrawSnow(int minimum,
                             int randrange,
                             gpdraw.SketchPad paper)
        Parameters:
        minimum - The minimum amount of snowflakes to draw
        randrange - The number from which the random number of snowflakes to add on top of minimum is
        paper - The gpdraw.SketchPad object to create a pen for and to draw on

      • P1_Wang_Jake_DrawSnow

        public P1_Wang_Jake_DrawSnow(int minimum,
                             int randrange,
                             java.awt.Color color,
                             int sizemin,
                             int sizemax,
                             gpdraw.SketchPad paper)
        Parameters:
        minimum - minimum number of "snowflakes". default 100
        randrange - range between lower and higher limits. Total number of snowflakes = minimum+(random number between 0 and randrange). default 50
        color - color of snowflakes. default (247, 255, 241) RGB
        sizemin - minimum radius of snowflake
        sizemax - maximum radius of snowflake
        paper - SketchPad object from gpdraw to draw on
